item.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. From this page you can find who we are and what we do. New sites provide this information and then claim the site as their own. You will need your own site to participate.
Pages about us.

item.prompt:
Link to a page about yourself here. Type your name enclosed in double square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

Make all pages here yours alone with the login below.

item.text: Pages where we do and share.

item.prompt: Create pages about things you do on this wiki. Type a descriptive name of something you will be writing about. Enclose it in square brackets. Then press Command/ALT-S to save.

item.text: You can edit your copy of these pages. Press [+] to add more writing spaces. Read [[How to Wiki]] for more ideas. Follow [[Recent Changes]] here and nearby.

item.title: DAO Conversations

item.text: Notes from DAO Design Jams - online gathering which happens on Sundays and brings together people interested in the topic of Decentralised Autonomous Organisations and potential their applications in the every day life.
item.title: DAO Conversations

story.text: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site. This is my writing space. Here I will collect stuff I am interested in, working on and want to know more about, so it is an equivalent of my social media profile.
My name is [[Ksenya]], also reffered to as [[K]]. I write on a number of [[Smallest Federated Wiki]]s about things I am interested in and work with.
This is what I'm doing at the moment:

Notes from DAO Design Jams - online gathering which happens on Sundays and brings together people interested in the topic of Decentralised Autonomous Organisations and potential their applications in the every day life.
